comments:
I was running Eclipse in Eclipse and hit a breakpoint in the debugger. I got an error
	message saying to check my log and here it is.

	Note that I tried to open up RPRS to enter this and it wouldn't open (got
	the not responding message) and then Eclipse died horriblely with a modal
	dialog saying something about unable to initialize default CgServer.
